# EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Copper plate mine at position(x=41.0, y=-82.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Burner mining drill (position x=41.0, y=-82.0) and a stone furnace at position(x=41.0, y=-80.0)
-  Burner mining drill (no other mining drills found) and a stone furnace at position(x=60.0, y=-60.0)

### Offshore pump at position(x=106.5, y=-32.5)
Consists of an offshore pump (position x=106.5, y=-32.5) and a boiler at position(x=111.5, y=-32.0)

### Steam power generation at position(x=117.5, y=-30.5)
Consists of a steam engine (position x=117.5, y=-30.5), a boiler at position(x=111.5, y=-32.0) and pipe groups at positions(x=107.5, y=-34.5) and (x=105.5, y=-32.5)

### Transport belt system at position(x=63.5, y=-53.5)
Consists of transport belts at positions (x=63.5, y=-53.5) and (x=64.5, y=-53.5)

# ERROR TIPS
### Errors when using burner entities without fuel
-  Ensure that burner entities have fuel before using them.

### Errors when using entities without ingredients
-  Ensure that entities have the necessary ingredients before using them.

### Errors when using steam engines without connection to a power network
-  Ensure that steam engines are connected to a power network before using them.

### Errors when using pipe groups without fluid
-  Ensure that pipe groups have fluid before using them.

### Errors when using belt groups without items
-  Ensure that belt groups have items before using them.

### Errors when using electricity groups without being plugged into an electric network
-  Ensure that electricity groups are plugged into an electric network before using them.

# NAMESPACE
No utility functions or variables have been defined or assigned in the provided execution logs.
